localizedDescriptions.ja: 全身を循環する動脈圧の指標として，局所で測定される血圧。一般的には「血圧」とは上腕で上腕動脈圧を測定したものをさすことが多い。
localizedDescriptions.en: The local measurement of arterial blood pressure which is a surrogate for arterial pressure in the systemic circulation.

annotations.comment: Most commonly, use of the term 'blood pressure' refers to measurement of brachial artery pressure in the upper arm.

localizedDescriptions.ja: デフォルトで、テンプレートや実行時に明示的に定義されていない任意の時点や間隔を示す。
localizedDescriptions.en: Default, unspecified point in time or interval event which may be explicitly defined in a template or at run-time.

localizedDescriptions.ja: 全身の動脈血圧での最高値 - 心機図の収縮期で測定される
localizedDescriptions.en: Peak systemic arterial blood pressure  - measured in systolic or contraction phase of the heart cycle.

localizedDescriptions.ja: 全身の動脈血圧での最低値 - 心機図の拡張期で測定される
localizedDescriptions.en: Minimum systemic arterial blood pressure - measured in the diastolic or relaxation phase of the heart cycle.

localizedDescriptions.ja: 心臓の収縮拡張サイクルのすべての過程を通した動脈血圧の平均値.
localizedDescriptions.en: The average arterial pressure that occurs over the entire course of the heart contraction and relaxation cycle.

localizedDescriptions.ja: 1回の収縮サイクルでの血圧の変動
localizedDescriptions.en: The difference between the systolic and diastolic pressure.
Single word, phrase or brief description that represents the clinical meaning and significance of the blood pressure measurement.

localizedDescriptions.ja: 他に項目のない、即的に関する叙述的な追加的記録
localizedDescriptions.en: Additional narrative about the measurement, not captured in other fields.

localizedDescriptions.ja: 計測のときの対象者の体位
localizedDescriptions.en: The position of the individual at the time of measurement.

localizedDescriptions.ja: 血圧測定時に立位
localizedDescriptions.en: Standing at the time of blood pressure measurement.

localizedDescriptions.ja: 血圧測定時に（たとえば、ベッドやいすの上で）坐位
localizedDescriptions.en: Sitting (for example on bed or chair) at the time of blood pressure measurement.

localizedDescriptions.ja: 血圧測定時に斜位
localizedDescriptions.en: Reclining at the time of blood pressure measurement.

localizedDescriptions.ja: 血圧測定時に臥位
localizedDescriptions.en: Lying flat at the time of blood pressure measurement.

localizedDescriptions.ja: 通常は頭から足までを水平にしてから左側に傾けられた状態。一般的には妊娠の第3トリメスターで大動脈・静脈を圧排から解放するために求められる体位である。
localizedDescriptions.en: Lying flat with some lateral tilt, usually angled towards the left side.   Commonly required in the last trimester of pregnancy to relieve aortocaval compression.

localizedDescriptions.ja: 血圧測定に寄与しうるその他の偶発的な要素についてのコメント。たとえば、不安の程度や「白衣性高血圧」、痛みや発熱、大気圧の変化など。
localizedDescriptions.en: Comment on and record other incidental factors that may be contributing to the blood pressure measurement.  For example, level of anxiety or 'white coat syndrome'; pain or fever; changes in atmospheric pressure etc.

localizedDescriptions.ja: 睡眠状況 24時間外来血圧記録の解釈を助けるため
localizedDescriptions.en: Sleep status - supports interpretation of 24 hour ambulatory blood pressure records.

localizedDescriptions.ja: 対象は完全に意識がある。
localizedDescriptions.en: The individual is fully conscious.

localizedDescriptions.ja: 対象は自然な休眠状態にある
localizedDescriptions.en: The individual is in the natural state of bodily rest.

localizedDescriptions.ja: 測定時に対象者が臥床している台の頭尾方向の傾き
localizedDescriptions.en: The craniocaudal tilt of the surface on which the person is lying at the time of measurement.

localizedDescriptions.ja: 24時間での推定平均血圧
localizedDescriptions.en: Estimate of the average blood pressure over a 24 hour period.

localizedDescriptions.ja: 全身の動脈血圧での最高値 - 心機図の収縮期で測定される
localizedDescriptions.en: Peak systemic arterial blood pressure  - measured in systolic or contraction phase of the heart cycle.

localizedDescriptions.ja: 全身の動脈血圧での最低値 - 心機図の拡張期で測定される
localizedDescriptions.en: Minimum systemic arterial blood pressure - measured in the diastolic or relaxation phase of the heart cycle.

localizedDescriptions.ja: 心臓の収縮拡張サイクルのすべての過程を通した動脈血圧の平均値.
localizedDescriptions.en: The average arterial pressure that occurs over the entire course of the heart contraction and relaxation cycle.

localizedDescriptions.ja: 1回の収縮サイクルでの血圧の変動
localizedDescriptions.en: The difference between the systolic and diastolic pressure.
Single word, phrase or brief description that represents the clinical meaning and significance of the blood pressure measurement.

localizedDescriptions.ja: 他に項目のない、即的に関する叙述的な追加的記録
localizedDescriptions.en: Additional narrative about the measurement, not captured in other fields.

localizedDescriptions.ja: 計測のときの対象者の体位
localizedDescriptions.en: The position of the individual at the time of measurement.

localizedDescriptions.ja: 血圧測定時に立位
localizedDescriptions.en: Standing at the time of blood pressure measurement.

localizedDescriptions.ja: 血圧測定時に（たとえば、ベッドやいすの上で）坐位
localizedDescriptions.en: Sitting (for example on bed or chair) at the time of blood pressure measurement.

localizedDescriptions.ja: 血圧測定時に斜位
localizedDescriptions.en: Reclining at the time of blood pressure measurement.

localizedDescriptions.ja: 血圧測定時に臥位
localizedDescriptions.en: Lying flat at the time of blood pressure measurement.

localizedDescriptions.ja: 通常は頭から足までを水平にしてから左側に傾けられた状態。一般的には妊娠の第3トリメスターで大動脈・静脈を圧排から解放するために求められる体位である。
localizedDescriptions.en: Lying flat with some lateral tilt, usually angled towards the left side.   Commonly required in the last trimester of pregnancy to relieve aortocaval compression.

localizedDescriptions.ja: 血圧測定に寄与しうるその他の偶発的な要素についてのコメント。たとえば、不安の程度や「白衣性高血圧」、痛みや発熱、大気圧の変化など。
localizedDescriptions.en: Comment on and record other incidental factors that may be contributing to the blood pressure measurement.  For example, level of anxiety or 'white coat syndrome'; pain or fever; changes in atmospheric pressure etc.

localizedDescriptions.ja: 睡眠状況 24時間外来血圧記録の解釈を助けるため
localizedDescriptions.en: Sleep status - supports interpretation of 24 hour ambulatory blood pressure records.

localizedDescriptions.ja: 対象は完全に意識がある。
localizedDescriptions.en: The individual is fully conscious.

localizedDescriptions.ja: 対象は自然な休眠状態にある
localizedDescriptions.en: The individual is in the natural state of bodily rest.

localizedDescriptions.ja: 測定時に対象者が臥床している台の頭尾方向の傾き
localizedDescriptions.en: The craniocaudal tilt of the surface on which the person is lying at the time of measurement.

localizedDescriptions.ja: 血圧測定のために使われるカフの大きさ.
localizedDescriptions.en: The size of the cuff used for blood pressure measurement.

annotations.comment: Perloff D, Grim C, Flack J, Frohlich ED, Hill M, McDonald M, Morgenstern BZ. Human blood pressure determination by sphygmomanometry. Circulation 1993;88;2460-2470.

localizedDescriptions.ja: 成人の大腿で血圧を測定するためのカフ。
localizedDescriptions.en: A cuff used for an adult thigh.

localizedDescriptions.ja: 大柄な成人の腕で測定するためのカフ。
localizedDescriptions.en: A cuff for adults with larger arms.

localizedDescriptions.ja: 一般的な成人のためのカフ
localizedDescriptions.en: A cuff that is standard for an adult.

localizedDescriptions.ja: 小柄な成人のためのカフ
localizedDescriptions.en: A cuff used for a small adult.

localizedDescriptions.ja: 小児あるいは痩せた成人のためのカフ
localizedDescriptions.en: A cuff that is appropriate for a child or adult with a thin arm.

localizedDescriptions.ja: 幼児のために使われるカフ
localizedDescriptions.en: A cuff used for infants.

localizedDescriptions.ja: 新生児用のカフ 想定されるカフは新生児の生下時体重と成熟度に応じて適切なものであること.
localizedDescriptions.en: A cuff used for a neonate, assuming cuff is the appropriate size for maturity and birthweight of the neonate.

localizedDescriptions.ja: 血圧が測定された一つの身体部位
localizedDescriptions.en: Simple body site where blood pressure was measured.

localizedDescriptions.ja: 測定対象者の右腕
localizedDescriptions.en: The right arm of the person.

localizedDescriptions.ja: 測定対象者の左腕
localizedDescriptions.en: The left arm of the person.

localizedDescriptions.ja: 測定対象者の右大腿
localizedDescriptions.en: The right thigh of the person.

localizedDescriptions.ja: 測定対象者の左大腿。
localizedDescriptions.en: The left thigh of the person.

localizedDescriptions.ja: 測定対象者の右手首
localizedDescriptions.en: The right wrist of the individual.

localizedDescriptions.ja: 測定対象者の左手首
localizedDescriptions.en: The left wrist of the individual.

localizedDescriptions.ja: 測定対象者の右足首
localizedDescriptions.en: The right ankle of the individual.

localizedDescriptions.ja: 測定対象者の左足首
localizedDescriptions.en: The left ankle of the individual.

localizedDescriptions.ja: 測定対象者の手指
localizedDescriptions.en: A finger of the individual.

localizedDescriptions.ja: 対象者の足尖部
localizedDescriptions.en: A toe of the individual.
The individual's dorsum of the foot.

localizedDescriptions.ja: 動脈内に間欠的方法で留置したトランスデューサからAラインを経由して測定
localizedDescriptions.en: Invasive measurement via transducer access line within an artery.

localizedDescriptions.ja: 血圧の測方法。
localizedDescriptions.en: Method of measurement of blood pressure.

localizedDescriptions.ja: 聴診器を使いコロトコフ音で外部から血圧を測定する方法.
localizedDescriptions.en: Method of measuring blood pressure externally, using a stethoscope and Korotkoff sounds.

localizedDescriptions.ja: 脈拍(通常は上腕動脈あるいは橈骨動脈）を触診することにより外部から血圧を測定する方法
localizedDescriptions.en: Method of measuring blood pressure externally, using palpation (usually of the brachial or radial arteries).

localizedDescriptions.ja: 血圧測定器を使って外部から血圧を測定する方法.
localizedDescriptions.en: Method of measuring blood pressure externally, using a blood pressure machine.

localizedDescriptions.ja: 経皮的に動脈を穿刺し，血管内部から血圧を測定する方法.
localizedDescriptions.en: Method of measuring blood pressure internally ie involving penetration of the skin and measuring inside blood vessels.

localizedDescriptions.ja: 平均動脈圧を計算するために使われた式（もしデータに記録されていれば）
localizedDescriptions.en: Formula used to calculate the Mean Arterial Pressure (if recorded in data).

localizedDescriptions.ja: *Formula used to calculate the systolic pressure from from mean arterial pressure (if recorded in data).(en)
localizedDescriptions.en: Formula used to calculate the systolic pressure from from mean arterial pressure (if recorded in data).

localizedDescriptions.ja: 平均動脈圧から拡張期血圧を計算するために使われた式（もしデータに記録されていれば）
localizedDescriptions.en: Formula used to calculate the diastolic pressure from mean arterial pressure (if recorded in data).

localizedDescriptions.ja: 拡張期圧を決めるためにどのコロトコフ音が使用されたかについて記録.
localizedDescriptions.en: Record which Korotkoff sound is used for determining diastolic pressure using auscultative method.

localizedDescriptions.ja: コロトコフの4音。急速に減弱する時期.
localizedDescriptions.en: The fourth Korotkoff sound is identified as an abrupt muffling of sounds.

localizedDescriptions.ja: コロトコフの5音が聴取される時期。カフ圧が拡張期圧を下回り音が聴取されなくなる時期
localizedDescriptions.en: The fifth Korotkoff sound is identified by absence of sounds as the cuff pressure drops below the diastolic blood pressure.
